reviewText: The DVD was in good condition and my son who I am sure has watched it already has not told me of any problems. The seller sent it out quickly so there were no issues from that area. I order most of my items from Amazon because I feel it is good quality and very very seldom have a problem. When there is a problem it has always be solved fast.

...Amazon came through with prompt delivery and nice packaging. My son loves Ben 10, so he was extremely excited to find this gift waiting for him after school. I too love this show. It is one of the rare animated shows that has nice scripts, great voice talents, and splendid animation. My son and I also like that the series progresses with characters aging and developing their skills.
My boys love Ben 10 and we are glad we added this to our collection.
Ordered this video for my nephew who loves Ben 10 for his birthday, it was a huge hit!  He's asking for the next few in the series for Christmas already.

My son is 10 and Autistic but higher functioning in some areas. He has loved Ben 10 since it came out. This is Volume 6 in the Ben 10 Alien Force Series. Here are some of our favorite previous volumes: Ben 10 Alien Force 1 (Std Sub),Ben 10: Alien Force, Vol. 3,Ben 10: Alien Force, Vol. 4,Ben 10: Alien Force, Vol. 5. A clarification on the number of episodes in these discs: The original Ben 10 (4 seasons) were all released as sets with all episodes for that season in the set. Typically that is 12-13 episodes or more. You can get all the following as "seasons" which contain all the episodes for that year: Ben 10 - The Complete Season 1,Ben 10: The Complete Season 2,Ben 10: The Complete Season 3, and Ben 10 - Season 4. Parents don't forget the following for your Ben 10 fan! Ben 10: Race Against Time and Ben 10 Alien Swarm. Overall from a consumers point of view the fact they are releasing only 4 episodes per disc is a bummer. However my son loves these so much and would play them every waking minute if he was allowed so I still consider the price to be worth it for us. DVD quality is fine.

my  8 yr old grandson loves ben 10  if he could live in his world he would  lol  he has every ben 10 movie there is  he has sneekers shirts games watches  and aliens  ben 10 and scooby doo are is favorites  so whatever comes out new for ben or scooby  he loves
Ben 10 Alien Force is my son's favorite cartoon and has all of the volumes.

The sixth volume of "Ben 10 Alien Force" has our hero Ben Tennyson in four new-to-DVD episodes including the epic two-part special "War of the Worlds" (how cliche).  In it, he and all the other heroes he can gather get ready for the ultimate Highbreed invasion.  But suddenly the Omnitrix Master Control has put into reset making things even more complicated.

Along with these episodes is another Alien Database showing more spacey specs of more aliens and heroes.

Look for the seventh volume coming soon plus an all-new series "Ben 10 Ultimate Alien" on Cartoon Network.

I overall gave this 3 stars, not because of poor quality, but because of the limited  number of episodes included in Vol. 6.

All other Volumes had a minimum of eight episodes and while this one cost the same amount, only had 4 episodes.

I felt that this was a rip off!!!

I could have downloaded off of ITunes and I would not have felt quite so cheated.

Contains...
Episode 23: Birds of a Feather
Episode 24: Unearthed
Episode 25: War of the Worlds, Part 1
Episode 26: War of the Worlds, Part 2

Special Features:
Alien Database
My son loves all the ben 10

I bought the 1st - 4th season DVD's via Amazon for my grandson last year.  He loves this series and as a family we've watched some episodes, they are entertaining!  The DVD's I ordered through this seller were in excellent condition and arrived when I expected.  I will purchase from them again!
I definitely love watching Ben 10 Alien Force! The entire concept of the ability to transform into aliens is just awesome! The show is great and action-packed too!
Well done volume but would have really liked to have each season separately. Whatever, I wanted the series and this was just a minor glitch.

Received the DVD a day sooner then the expected arrival date, so that was cool; however the case that the DVD came in was shipped to me with the plastic slightly opened and with a deep puncture mark in the case. The DVD itself was undamaged but I'm picky about these things so that was a bit of an annoyance.
